alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Jemez Mountains; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 21 at 2:53PM MST until December 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations up on one foot possible across the peaks, with lesser amounts down to 8,000ft. * WHERE...Northern Mountains. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire chains may be necessary if traveling through mountain passes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visit NMRoads.com or dial 511 for the latest road conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Persons should consider delaying all travel. Motorists should use extreme caution if travel is absolutely necessary.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Jemez Mountains; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama
